name: HM_ACTIVE
description: This table contains information regarding potential future Health Maintenance completions.

columns.name: PAT_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the patient record for this row. This column is frequently used to link to the PATIENT table.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: HM_ACT_STD_TOPIC_ID
columns.description: This column stores a Health Maintenance Topic ID for potential future completions.

columns.name: HM_ACT_STD_TOPIC_ID_NAME
columns.description: The name of the health maintenance topic.

columns.name: HM_ACT_DATE
columns.description: This column displays the date of action for a potential Health Maintenance completion.

columns.name: HM_ACT_ORDER_ID
columns.description: This column displays the orders that, once completed, will complete a Health Maintenance topic.
